    • Method Detail

      • addEmailAttachments

        public java.util.List<EmailAttachment> addEmailAttachments(EmailAttachment... attachment)
        Convenience method. Allows adding of many attachments on one method call. Does not allow you to handle your own exceptions.
        Parameters:
        attachment -
        Returns:
        all the attachments which failed either because the mimeBodyPart generation failed or there was another exception.

      • addEmailAttachment

        public boolean addEmailAttachment(EmailAttachment attachment)
                           throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                  java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.Exception
        Adds the given attachment as a body part. First checks whether the attachment has bytes already. This allows you to give an email attachment which has bytes in memory and doesn't have an actual file. If the bytes are null it reads the bytes from the file. If the file is null no attachment is added.
        Parameters:
        attachment -
        Returns:
        whether the attachment was successfully added to the bodyParts list
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
